definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life

sentences.english: The opposite of acids are bases, or alkaloids.
The wine is elegant with persistent velvety tannins.
sentences.chinese: 酒味典雅，含有柔和的丹宁酸。

sentences.english: It~s bitter, sour and peppery, but also sweet.
sentences.chinese: 这是苦的，酸和暴躁，而且甜。

sentences.english: Lime tree coffee shop reminds me of Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 酸橙树咖啡馆使我想起了洛杉矶。

sentences.english: RDQ is a useful tool in the assessment of proximal esophageal acid reflux.
sentences.chinese: RDQ在评估近端食管酸反流有一定临床意义。

sentences.english: SOUR】Some people don't like lemon juice, it tastes sour.
sentences.chinese: 有些人不喜欢柠檬汁，因为它是酸的。

sentences.english: Conclusion There is no aristolochic acid in Xinmazhike Granules.
sentences.chinese: 结论该品中不含马兜铃酸。

sentences.english: These acids give the fruits tartness and slow down bacterial spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 这些酸把水果并减缓细菌酸的性质。

sentences.english: These acids give the fruits tartness and slow down bacterial spoilage.
sentences.chinese: 这些酸把水果并减缓细菌酸的性质。

sentences.english: Crush juice from a grape . I think it's just sour grapes.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他这样说不过是吃不到葡萄便说葡萄酸。

sentences.english: The worker's overalls were badly burned by acid.
sentences.chinese: 这位工人的工作装被酸腐蚀得很厉害。

sentences.english: Acid increased the ratio of extraction of proanthocyanidins.
sentences.chinese: 酸提高了原花青素的提取率。

sentences.english: Data from preclinical studies of zoledronic acid suggest its definite anti-tumor effect.
sentences.chinese: 多个临床前研究显示唑来膦酸具有明确的抗肿瘤作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Progress in recent pharmacological studies of Rosmarinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨迷迭香酸药理研究近况。

sentences.english: The calcium tolerance of phosphonic acid is lower than polymer type scale inhibitors.
sentences.chinese: 有机膦酸的钙容忍度低于聚合物防垢剂。

sentences.english: To study the pharmacokinetics and relative bioavailability of tosufloxacin tosylate dispersible tablet in healthy volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 研究甲苯璜酸妥舒沙星分散片的相对生物利用度。
